word_mean: 单特异性的：指对一种抗原或微生物特异的血清疫苗或抗毒素

sentence.Network_en: Halogen atoms contain seven electrons in their valence shell, and , consequently, are monovalent.
sentence.Network_cn: 卤原子在它们的价电子层含有七个电子, 因此是一价的.

sentence.Network_en: A monovalent vaccine; a monovalent serum.
sentence.Network_cn: 沙克疫苗是一种不会传染的疫苗.

sentence.Network_en: But Carol Pandak says the monovalent vaccine is not enough in areas with both.
sentence.Network_cn: 但卡罗尔.潘达克指出两类脊髓灰质炎的专项疫苗都不充足.
